scripts.start:client: cross-env ELECTRON_ROLE=client concurrently "next dev renderer -p 8889" "wait-on http://localhost:8889 && electron . 8889"
scripts.start:client-simple: echo Please close HOST app first, then press any key... && pause && cross-env ELECTRON_ROLE=client nextron
scripts.start:client-network: echo Enter HOST computer IP address: && set /p HOST_IP= && cross-env ELECTRON_ROLE=client HOST_IP=%HOST_IP% nextron
scripts.network:host: echo Starting HOST mode for network sharing... && npm run start:websocket & npm run start:host
